scripts.angular: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "$(npm run -s install @angular/cli); ng new $1; cd $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.cra: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "$(npm run -s install create-react-app); create-react-app $1; cd $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.ember: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "$(npm run -s install ember-cli); ember new $1; cd $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.preact: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "$(npm run -s install preact-cli); preact create default $1; cd $1"; fi; };run
scripts.vue: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo "$(npm run -s install @vue/cli); vue create $1; cd $1; "; fi; }; run
scripts.rn: run(){ echo 'react-native-app'; if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run -s prompt; else echo " $(npm run -s install expo-cli); expo init $1; cd $1;"; fi; };run
scripts.js-house: run(){ npm run -s angular $1; npm run -s cra $1; npm run -s ember $1; npm run -s preact $1; npm run -s vue $1;}; run
scripts.js-house-v: run(){ echo 'runAll(){'; npm run -s angular angular-$1; echo 'cd ..;'; npm run -s cra cra-$1; echo 'cd ..;'; npm run -s ember ember-$1; echo 'cd ..;'; npm run -s preact preact-$1; echo 'cd ..;'; npm run -s vue vue-$1; echo 'cd ..;'; echo 'npm run show'; echo '}; runAll'; echo ; }; run
scripts.install: run(){ echo "npm uninstall -g $1; npm install -g $1"; }; run
scripts.prompt: echo 'no arg passed ðŸ™‚,'; echo 'exiting: please provide a file name';
scripts.show: dir(){ for d in ./*/ ; do (echo "$d"); done; }; echo 'project update: look at all of the cool projects! âœ¨ âœ¨ ðŸŒˆ '; echo ; dir; echo ;
